articles.title: India monsoon rains cause fatal bridge collapse
articles.description: A bridge collapses in India following seasonal rains in Kangra, Himachal Pradesh, killing at least two people.
articles.content:
A bridge has collapsed in India following seasonal monsoon rains in Kangra, Himachal Pradesh.
At least two people are known to have died.
